title: George Galloway – 2022 Comments on the Personal Conduct of Michelle Mone
author: admin
summary: The comments made by George Galloway, the former Respect and Labour MP, on Twitter on 6 January 2022.
content:
If true, there must be a prison sentence at the end of this:
